content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a perfect fit for your needs. How much are you considering for the rental price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price that reflects the value of the apartment. Could you please tell me your initial asking price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. I believe my apartment is quite reasonable at 1,200 Euro per month. This includes all utilities and amenities. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the price, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the utilities and amenities being included. However, I am looking to negotiate a lower price, as I am a student and want to find the best deal possible. Would you be willing to consider a lower offer?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: As a landlord, I am always open to considering reasonable offers. However, I must also ensure that I am not undercutting the value of my property. What price were you considering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mister Schmidt. I respect that you need to protect the value of your property. As a student, I'm on a budget and would appreciate if we could negotiate a price that is more aligned with my financial circumstances. Would you consider a price closer to 900 Euro per month? I think this would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your honesty about your financial situation. While 900 Euro per month is lower than my initial offer, I am willing to negotiate. How does 1,100 Euro per month sound to you? This is still a fair price for the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer, Mister Schmidt. 1,100 Euro per month is closer to what I am looking for. Could we discuss any additional perks or concessions that might be available? For example, would you consider including Wi-Fi or a parking spot? These would be very helpful to me.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Maryam. I can offer you a parking spot at an additional cost of 50 Euro per month. As for Wi-Fi, I can provide you with a list of recommended providers and help you set up an account if needed. Would these additions make the rental more attractive to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Absolutely, Mister Schmidt. Having a parking spot and assistance with Wi-Fi setup is very appealing. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on these additional amenities. Would it be possible to include these in the monthly rent for a slightly lower price, say 1,050 Euro per month? This would include both the parking spot and Wi-Fi setup assistance.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that these additions are attractive to you, Maryam. However, I must maintain a certain profit margin for myself. How about this: if you are willing to sign a one-year lease, I can offer you the apartment for 1,050 Euro per month, including the parking spot and Wi-Fi setup assistance. This is a special offer for long-term tenants. Would you be interested in such a lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: A one-year lease with those additional perks at 1,050 Euro per month is very appealing, Mister Schmidt. I would be interested in signing such a lease. It would provide me with the stability I need as a student and the peace of mind of knowing I have a comfortable place to live for the next year. I agree to the price of 1,050 Euro per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Fantastic, Maryam! I'm glad we've reached an agreement. The apartment will be yours for a year at 1,050 Euro per month, including the parking spot and Wi-Fi setup assistance. I'll prepare the lease agreement for you to sign. Once you've signed it, we can proceed with the move-in process. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
